defaultItems.description: Apple iPad Air from 2020. Was used for taking notes and watching lectures on.

defaultItems.description: Brand new bullet journal that was never used. Great for journaling, logging, and creating your own calendars.

defaultItems.name: Black Addison Top
defaultItems.description: Used Brandy Melville black addison top. Still in great shape. Size small.

defaultItems.name: "You are Beautiful" Wall Decor
defaultItems.description: Picture-frame for wall decoration

defaultItems.name: White Lamp
defaultItems.description: White Lamp from Amazon. Great for studying or keeping next to bed.

defaultItems.name: Mini Wood Skateboard
defaultItems.description: I used this skateboard to get to and from school when I lived in the dorms. Great for speedy and convenient transportation if you are traveling close distances from campus.

defaultItems.name: Apple Pencil
defaultItems.description: Apple Pencil Generation 2. Only used it for one semester to take notes.

defaultItems.name: Black Gym Bag
defaultItems.description: Only used it a few times to go to the gym. Has many pockets.

defaultItems.name: Hamper
defaultItems.description: Cute gradient hamper. Very durable and can hold a lot of clothes.

defaultItems.name: Hydroflasks
defaultItems.description: Brand new hydroflasks. Must take BOTH!

defaultItems.name: Shower Caddy
defaultItems.description: Brand new shower caddy. Highly recommend if you are dorming.

defaultItems.name: Happy Blue Pens
defaultItems.description: Great pens for journaling and note-taking. Also very cute!!

defaultItems.name: Interactive General Chemistry Textbook
defaultItems.description: Physical copy of textbook used for Chem 161.

defaultItems.name: Poo-Pourri
defaultItems.description: A MUST have! Spray a few spritz before doing your business in the bathroom. It eliminates the odor!

defaultItems.name: Mens UH Manoa Sweatshirt
defaultItems.description: Green mens UH Manoa sweatshirt in size medium.

defaultItems.name: Focus-Notes Notebook
defaultItems.description: This notebook is great for cornell note-taking.

defaultItems.name: Archaeology and Humanity's Story Textbook
defaultItems.description: Archaeology and Humanity's Story: A Brief Introduction to World Prehistory 1st Edition. This textbook was used for ANTH 151.

defaultItems.name: Sony Headphones
defaultItems.description: Great alternatives to the Apple headphones. Did the job for me and has bluetooth and noise-cancelling too.

defaultItems.name: Kristin Ess Shampoo
defaultItems.description: Accidentally bought an extra bottle. This is part of "The One Signature Shampoo" line.

defaultItems.name: Light Blue Moped
defaultItems.description: I used this moped when I lived near campus. Great alternative to a car and much cheaper too.

defaultItems.name: Gray Tupperwares
defaultItems.description: Set of 3 gray glass tupperwares. Leakproof and very sturdy.

defaultItems.name: Black Yoga Mat
defaultItems.description: I have only used this black yoga mat a few times. Great quality and comes with a wrap.

defaultItems.name: Pink Desk Chair
defaultItems.description: Very cute and chic pink chair that is height adjustable.

defaultItems.name: Washed Green UH Cap
defaultItems.description: Custom-made green UH cap. Only worn it once.

defaultItems.name: Happy Sticky Notes
defaultItems.description: Cute and blue "Happy" sticky notes.

defaultItems.name: Adidas Windbreaker
defaultItems.description: Great black Adidas windbreaker that no longer fits me. Size small.

defaultItems.name: Portable Stove
defaultItems.description: I used this portable stove a few times when I lived off-campus. Works like a charm and does the job.

defaultItems.name: Bath and Body Works Shower Gel
defaultItems.description: Got this as a gift, but I have too many to use already.

defaultItems.name: Marble Soap Pump
defaultItems.description: Recently got an upgrade, but this fancy soap pump still works great! Just outgrew it.

defaultItems.name: USB-C to HDMI Adapter
defaultItems.description: Originally bought this for $50 and used it a lot for classes. Do not sleep on this deal!

defaultItems.name: Multimedia Foundations Textbook
defaultItems.description: Multimedia Foundations (2nd Edition) by Vic Costello. This textbook was used for COM 310

defaultItems.name: Maroon Gym Shorts
defaultItems.description: Use these shorts for the gym, workouts, and even going out! I love them, but am de-cluttering my closet. Size large.

defaultItems.name: Black 1.6 Cu. Ft. Mini Fridge
defaultItems.description: Perfect, personal mini-fridge. The door has bottle holders on the side and complies with UH Manoa dorming policies.

defaultItems.name: Shaka Pennyboard
defaultItems.description: Slightly used pennyboard from Penny Australia. Highly recommended for beginners or those who would like to try pennyboarding.

defaultItems.name: Set of 3 Black Pans
defaultItems.description: Start cooking with these set of 3 black pans! Great price for the quantities and quality.

defaultItems.name: Blue Jump Rope
defaultItems.description: Blue generic jump rope for getting that workout at the gym.

defaultItems.name: Wooden Cutting Boards
defaultItems.description: Set of 3 wooden cutting boards. Great for beginners and those just learning to cook! Also easy to maintain.

defaultItems.name: 5lb Green Dumbbells
defaultItems.description: If you are looking to add to your workouts or give yourself a challenge, definitely pick these up!

defaultItems.name: 2023 Calendar
defaultItems.description: Since 2023 has long began, this calendar is being marked at a bargain!

defaultItems.name: White Cube Storage
defaultItems.description: Comes with the three pictured cube containers and am also willing to drop it off for free.

defaultItems.name: Nebula Projector
defaultItems.description: This is a HIGH quality item! Do not skimp out on this deal! Barely used, but I am moving off island and cannot bring it with me.

defaultItems.name: Pink Pen/pencil Organizer
defaultItems.description: Super cute and fun organizer to keep on your desk for your pens, pencils, and notes!

defaultItems.name: Animal Behavior Textbook
defaultItems.description: Animal Behavior (12th Edition) by Dustin R. Rubenstein. This textbook is used for BIO 306.

defaultItems.name: Foundations of Astronomy
defaultItems.description: Originally bought it used from someone else, but this book has done me well, especially for the price-point!

defaultItems.name: Social and Personality Development Textbook
defaultItems.description: Social and Personality Development (6th Edition) by David R. Shaffer. Used for PSY 341.

defaultItems.name: Segway Electronic Scooter
defaultItems.description: Busted but still functional Segway scooter. If you know, then you know these things are worth a fortune! Works like a charm, despite its many scratches.

defaultSellers.bio: My name is John and I like to sleep.
I am a Computer Science Undergrad. I like dogs.
I am from the Bay Area and I love crocheting!
I love exploring new places and trying out new restaurants.
I enjoy volunteering at different places especially conservation related opportunities!
I am the Student Relations Coordinator.
